document_data.name: Blood Wine
document_data.Description:
This heavy-bodied wine had deep red tones complimented by a full taste with a slight afterbite.

Blood Wine used shriveled grapes that only grew on vines rumored to be possessed by [[spirit]]s who performed acts of cruelty during life.
document_data.Availability:
* [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-univere)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] sold Blood Wine in a variety of containers.
* The [[Candlekeep Inn]] had Blood wine on its drinks menu, charging 5 [[copper piece]]s per glass.{{Cite dragon/255/Baldur's Gate: Candlekeep|57}}
* The [[Nashkel Inn]] in [[Amn]] carried Aglarond Blood Wine, charging 8 [[gold]] pieces per serving.
* The popularity of Blood Wine reached [[Menzoberranzan]], an infamous [[drow]] city in the [[Underdark]]. The wine was among goods imported into the City of Spiders from the surface world.
document_data.Prices:
Blood Wine could be purchased in the following containers:
* Hand keg (15 [[sp]])
* Cask (4 [[gp]])
* Barrel (10 gp)
* [[Butt]] (30 gp)
* [[Tun]] (70 gp)
